settings.title: Alfa Laval CPM Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval CPM Constant-Pressure Modulating Valve is a pneumatic regulating valve designed to maintain a constant pressure in hygienic process lines at the valve inlet or outlet. It ensures safety, reliability, and easy cleaning. These valves offer precise pressure control by swiftly adjusting their position to maintain pre-set values without requiring electronic control.

  • Safe, effective pressure control
  • Self-draining design
  • Excellent valve cleanability
  • Easy to install, simple to operate
  • High hygienic level

The Alfa Laval CPM Constant-Pressure Modulating Valve is a pneumatic regulating valve that ensures uniform pressure in hygienic process lines for various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, and personal care. It is commonly used in applications like filling and bottling equipment.

settings.title: Alfa Laval SB Pressure Exhaust Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SB Pressure Exhaust Valve is a pneumatic regulating valve designed to automatically release pressure from hygienic process tanks when it exceeds the set pressure. For enhanced safety, the set pressure can be easily adjusted manually or remotely through a central control system connection.

  • Reliable control of tank top pressure
  • Easy to integrate with SCANDI BREW® safety valves and top plates
  • Fully cleanable with Cleaning-in-Place system
  • Easy to integrate into existing installations
  • Low investment due to simplified installation

The Alfa Laval SB Pressure Exhaust Valve is specifically designed for use in process tanks or vessels for hygienic applications across various industries, including brewery, food, dairy, and beverage, among others.

settings.title: Alfa Laval SB Tank Pressure Regulator Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SB Tank Pressure Regulator maintains the working pressure in the vapor space of a process tank during filling, processing, and emptying. It connects directly to the gas or Cleaning-in-Place (CIP) pipe leading to the tank top or can be incorporated into a flow panel. This ensures process safety, effectiveness, and product integrity.

  • Reliable, constant tank pressure control
  • Variable pressure setting
  • Optimized cleaning
  • Built-in pressure gauge
  • Fully cleanable with Cleaning-in-Place system

This control valve is commonly used to regulate pressure in tanks across various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, and brewery. It seamlessly integrates with the Alfa Laval SCANDI BREW® tank top system.

settings.title: Alfa Laval Unique RV-P Valve
settings.content:
he Alfa Laval Unique RV-P Regulating Valve is an automatic hygienic valve equipped with an electro-pneumatic actuator. It is designed for applications demanding precise control of flow, pressure, temperature, and tank fluid levels

  • Precision flow control
  • Advanced hygienic valve design
  • Dedicated protection
  • Reliable operation
  • Large operating range

The Unique RV-P Regulating Valve is specifically designed to provide precise flow control in various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, biotechnology, and pharmaceuticals.

settings.title: Alfa Laval Unique RV-ST Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Unique RV-ST Regulating Valve is the latest generation of single-seat valves, ideal for high-volume, hygienic liquid processing applications that require precise flow rate or pressure control. It meets the highest standards of hygiene and safety. Sizes from 1½" to 4" come with a plug seal for shut-off functionality, while 1" sizes do not have a plug seal.

  • Reliable, automated performance
  • Versatile, modular design
  • Outstanding precision flow
  • Easy to maintain
  • Large operating range

The Alfa Laval Unique RV-ST Regulating Valve, a pneumatic single-seat valve, is perfect for use as a hygienic product valve in various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, chemical, and pharmaceuticals.
